page.title: 14 CARS, BIKES AND GARAGES
page.content: {RESULTS OF SURVEY OF CROSS SECTION OF {THE VILLAGE OF WILLAND. (100 RETURNS) ______________________________________ HAVE YOU A GARAGE ? YES {52% }NO {41% ______________________________________ HOW MANY CARS HAS YOUR HOUSEHOLD ? 0={20%}__1={51%}__2={25%}_3+ ={3% HOW MANY MOTOR_BIKES HAS YOUR HOUSE ? 0={93%}_____1= {6.5% HOW MANY CYCLES HAS YOUR HOUSEHOLD ? 0={33%}__1={16%}__2={23%}__3={13%} 4={ 8%}__5={ 2%}__6+ ={1%} HAS YOUR HOUSE A B.M.X. BIKE ? YES {15% }NO {84% } WHAT % OF CARS ARE ESTATE={13%}SALOON= {49% }HATCHBACK= {25% }VANS= {13% }? MOST POPULAR MAKES OF CARS IN THE VILLAGE OF WILLAND ARE 1=FORD 2=BRITISH LEYLAND 3=GENERAL MOTORS. OTHERS=LANCIA,N.S.U.,OPEL, RENAULT, HONDA, CITRON, DATSUN,VOLVO,LADA.
